subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ghostman video

This is so cool!  I remember a couple of years ago, on another board, Frank=
 used to get references to pizza a lot.  I think they would tell him to ord=
er it and what toppings to get.

Robin


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: Steve Hultay<mailto:urkel23@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<m=
ailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Wednesday, February 06, 2008 3:55 A=
M
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ghostman video


  Frank,

  About 5 seconds in =
on the video to about 8 seconds they say "We Eat 
  Pizza", that's what i h=
ear anyway. That's funny because i was doing a 
  session over Skype with m=
y sister and i told my sister i had to go and 
  eat and the box said "Yeah=
 Pizza". They were close, i was having food 
  delivered from a pizza place=
 but i was having lasagna. Either way i 
  think they like pizza. Maybe it'=
s all they serve over there???

  -Steve H.

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> =

  wrote:
  >
  > 
  > This is the "Ghostman" an old digital Walkman, with =
a sweep 
  generator, amplifiers to drive stereo speakers, and line output =
for a 
  recorder. My one of a kind version of the Mini Box.
  > 
  > Frank=
-S
